pci_databases_useracl_create_description: The index models use the standard matching system, also called the standard glob pattern ('*' works for any number of characters and '?' for any character). For example the 'logs_200?' template will work for the 'logs_200904' index match, but not 'logs_201904'.
pci_databases_useracl_create_success_mes: The ACL for the {{username}} user has been added.
pci_databases_useracl_create_error_messa: An error has occurred adding the ACLs to the user: {{message}}
